path.description: The path at which the umbrella chart with the dependency can be found.

charts.description: A list of chart dependencies which should receive updates.

repository.description: The repository of the subchart, as defined in `Chart.yaml`. It also supports OCI charts using `oci://`.

name.description: The name of the subchart, as defined in `Chart.yaml`.

kind.description: The kind of origin. Currently only 'Warehouse' is supported. Required.

name.description: The name of the origin. Required.

version.description: The version of the subchart to update to. If not specified, a version referenced by the Freight is used.
